title: Tagged [short story]
description: Jake and Rachael met in college and knew they were fated to be together forever. But as it always does, real life intervenes and things are never quire what you think they will be.Jake thinks that Rachael is selfish and wastes money. She also doesn't respect him, his possessions or his work.Rachael thinks that Jake is an inconsiderate slob who never takes her feelings into account.This leads to a battle of wills. Will they be tagged forever with labels that may or may not be accurate? Who will win and who will lose?
author: D.B. McNicol
